conbody.p: The list below represents some of the most critical installation requirements that, when overlooked, often result in operational problems, down time, and needless parts replacement. This is not a complete list. Before performing any troubleshooting procedures, use the list below to check for installation errors.
conbody.note: Costs to correct installation errors are not covered under the limited warranty. See Commercial Water Heater Limited Warranty.
conbody.p: Ensure all installation requirements and instructions in this manual have been maintained and followed.
